name: Angry Angry Dad
description:
This game is a winner of the UE4 Spring Jam. The theme was "Spring into action"

Game was created by

@Allshar
@DennyRocketDev
@d3rzo
@jakayaki
@Slapunas

Music

"Heros theme" by Twin Musicom (twinmusicom.org) under https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

"64 Pop Sting" by Twin Musicom (twinmusicom.org) under https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
